# Pull Request Template Selection

**Click the 'Preview' tab and select a PR template:**

- [🐛 Bug Fix](?expand=1&template=bugfix.md)
- [✨ New Feature](?expand=1&template=feature.md)
- [⚡ Enhancement](?expand=1&template=enhancement.md)
